get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the supported networks on GeckoTerminal**

200.description: Get list of supported networks

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the latest pools across all networks on GeckoTerminal**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`, `network`

200.description: Get latest pools across all networks

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the trending pools across all networks on GeckoTerminal**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`, `network`. 
 Example: `base_token` or `base_token,dex`

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description:
duration to sort trending list by 
 Default value: 24h

200.description: Get trending pools across all networks

get.summary: Supported Dexes List by Network (ID Map)
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the supported decentralized exchanges (DEXs) based on the provided network on GeckoTerminal**

200.description: Get list of supported DEXs on a network

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the top pools based on the provided network and decentralized exchange (DEX)**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
sort the pools by field 
 Default value: h24_tx_count_desc

200.description: Get top pools on a network's DEX

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the latest pools based on provided network**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

200.description: Get latest pools on a network

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the top pools based on the provided network**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
sort the pools by field 
 Default value: h24_tx_count_desc

200.description: Get top pools on a network

get.summary: Multiple Pools Data by Pool Addresses
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query multiple pools based on the provided network and pool address**

parameters.name: addresses
parameters.description: pool contract address, comma-separated if more than one pool contract address

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

200.description: Get multiple pools on a network

get.summary: Specific Pool Data by Pool Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query the specific pool based on the provided network and pool address**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

200.description: Get specific pool on a network

get.summary: Pool Tokens Info by Pool Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query pool metadata (base and quote token details, image, socials, websites, description, contract address, etc.) based on a provided pool contract address on a network**

200.description: Get pool tokens info on a network

get.summary: Pool OHLCV chart by Pool Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get the OHLCV chart (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) of a pool based on the provided pool address on a network**

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.description:
time period to aggregate each OHLCV 
 Available values (day): `1` 
 Available values (hour): `1` , `4` , `12` 
 Available values (minute): `1` , `5` , `15` 
 Default value: 1

parameters.name: before_timestamp
parameters.description: return OHLCV data before this timestamp (integer seconds since epoch)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
number of OHLCV results to return, maximum 1000 
 Default value: 100

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description:
return OHLCV in USD or quote token 
 Default value: usd

parameters.name: token
parameters.description:
return OHLCV for token 
 use this to invert the chart 
 Available values: 'base', 'quote' or token address 
 Default value: 'base'

parameters.name: include_empty_intervals
parameters.description: include empty intervals with no trade data, default: false

200.description: Get OHLCV data of a pool

get.summary: Past 24 Hour Trades by Pool Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query the last 300 trades in the past 24 hours based on the provided pool address**

parameters.name: trade_volume_in_usd_greater_than
parameters.description:
filter trades by trade volume in USD greater than this value 
 Default value: 0

parameters.name: token
parameters.description:
return trades for token 
 use this to invert the chart 
 Available values: 'base', 'quote' or token address 
 Default value: 'base'

200.description: Get last 300 trades in past 24 hours from a pool

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query multiple tokens data based on the provided token contract addresses on a network**

parameters.name: addresses
parameters.description: token contract address, comma-separated if more than one token contract address

200.description: Get multiple tokens on a network

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query specific token data based on the provided token contract address on a network**

200.description: Get specific token on a network

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query token metadata (name, symbol,  CoinGecko ID, image, socials, websites, description, etc.) based on a provided token contract address on a network**

200.description: Get specific token info on a network

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query top pools based on the provided token contract address on a network**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
sort the pools by field 
 Default value: h24_volume_usd_liquidity_desc

200.description: Get top pools for a token

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query the trending pools based on the provided network**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description:
duration to sort trending list by 
 Default value: 24h

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **search for pools on a network**

parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get token price based on the provided token contract address on a network**

parameters.name: addresses
parameters.description: token contract address, comma-separated if more than one token contract address

parameters.name: mcap_fdv_fallback
parameters.description: return FDV if market cap is not available, default: false

parameters.name: include_total_reserve_in_usd
parameters.description: include total reserve in USD, default: false

200.description: Get current USD prices of multiple tokens on a network

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query 100 most recently updated tokens info of a specific network or across all networks on GeckoTerminal**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Attributes for related resources to include, which will be returned under the top-level 'included' key

parameters.name: network
parameters.description:
filter tokens by provided network 
 *refers to [/networks](/reference/networks-list)

200.description: Get 100 tokens info across all networks ordered by most recently updated
